data.persona: I am looking for a new place to live.  I have been to many places.  My life is on the road and I like it what way.
data.description:
You are in the weathered shack.
A weathered shack with a roof made of old broken tiles sits in the middle of the forest. The wood is starting to split and the shack appears as if it will crumble at any moment.
There's a Tool, a tile, a fence, a shack, and a wood here.
The bird and the man are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to get my strength up
data.mid_motivation: I need to continue my journey and reach the next town
data.long_motivation: I am traveling to all the nearby villages in hopes I will a home
